Entry.JapaneseText: くぅーっ、やっぱり絵画はいい！ 心が洗われるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: Whew, these paintings sure are great! I feel as though my troubles have been washed away!

Entry.JapaneseText: 図書館で借りてきた画集だネ。
Entry.EnglishText: That's an art book you borrowed from the library, isn't it.

Entry.JapaneseText: えらそうな事言って、本当にわかってるの？ 絵画っていうのは奥が深いのよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You say such lofty things, but do you really understand them? Paintings carry deep meanings, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: え？ あ、ああ…… わかってるぜ、うんうん。
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? Oh, yeah... I get them. Yep, yep.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>…… 本が上下さかさまだヨ……？
